member.name: M:XComboGrid.GridDB.getDataRowFilter(System.String,System.Data.DataColumn[],System.Object)
member.summary: Untuk melakukan pencarian Data. Sbg. Contoh : DataTable.DefaultView.RowFilter = "Nama_Colom1 Like '% value %' Or Nama_Colom2 LIKE '% value %'", dan jika Kolom terdapat SPASI lakukan kode sperti ini [Nama Colom1]. CREATED BY : [aN] - 2015 - ccomputing.web.id
member.param: Masukkan query yang akan di Eksekusi.
Lakukan penyesuaian dengan jumlah Field yang akan di munculkan (Max. 20 Field). Sebagai Contoh : "{New DataColumn("Kode"), New DataColumn("User Name")}"

member.summary: Raised when the Popup Window is about to be cancelled. The property can be set to true to prevent the form from being cancelled.

member.name: M:XComboGrid.vbAccelerator.Components.Controls.PopupWindowHelperMessageFilter.PreFilterMessage(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)
member.summary: Checks the message loop for mouse messages whilst the popup window is displayed. If one is detected the position is checked to see if it is outside the form, and the owner is notified if so.
member.param: Windows Message about to be processed by the message loop
member.returns: true to filter the message, false otherwise. This implementation always returns false.

member.name: M:XComboGrid.vbAccelerator.Components.Controls.PopupWindowHelperMessageFilter.OnMouseDown
member.summary: Checks the mouse location and calls the OnCancelPopup method if the mouse is outside the popup form.

member.summary: Raises the event.
